sen.j: 吉備 由利（きび の ゆり、生年不詳 - 宝亀5年1月2日 (旧暦)（ユリウス暦774年2月17日））は奈良時代後期の宮人。
sen.e: Kibi no yuri (year of birth unknown - February 21, 774) is a government official in the latter half of the Nara Period.
KIBI no Yuri (year of birth unknown - February 17, 774) is a government official in the latter half of the Nara Period.
sen.cmt: ・姓は大文字にしました。・名前の頭を大文字にしました。・没年が原文と異なっていたので変更しました。
sen.e: KIBI no Yuri (year of birth unknown - February 17, 774) is a government official in the latter half of the Nara Period.
She is also known as Kibi Myobu (title for high-ranking court ladies.

sen.j: 吉備真備の娘か姉妹とみられる。
sen.e: She is believed to be a daughter or younger sister of KIBI no Makibi.

sen.j: 藤原仲麻呂の乱後、真備とともに称徳天皇に信頼された。
sen.e: After the Rebellion of Fujiwara no Nakamaro, she and Makibi gained Emperor Shotoku's trust.
After the Rebellion of FUJIWARA no Nakamaro, she and Makibi gained Empress Shotoku's trust.
sen.cmt: ・姓は大文字にしました。・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。
sen.e: After the Rebellion of FUJIWARA no Nakamaro, she and Makibi gained Empress Shotoku's trust.

sen.j: 側近として典蔵を務め、従三位に昇進した。
sen.e: She served as 典蔵, as a close adviser, and was promoted to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: 「典蔵」は定訳不明のため原文のままとしました。
sen.e: She served as Kuranosuke, as a close adviser, and was promoted to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: ・「典蔵」の読みは「くらのすけ」としました。下記サイトを参照しました。http://kotobank.jp/word/%E5%85%B8%E8%94%B5
sen.e: She served as Kuranosuke, as a close adviser, and was promoted to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).

sen.j: 神護景雲4年（770年）、称徳天皇が病臥すると、ただ一人寝所に出入りを許され、群臣との取り次ぎを務めたという。
sen.e: It is said that when Emperor Shotoku became ill, she was the only person who was allowed to visit the emperor's bedroom, serving as a liaison with the emperor's retainers or subjects.
It is said that when Empress Shotoku became ill in 770, she was the only person who was allowed to visit the emperor's bedroom, serving as a liaison with the emperor's retainers or subjects.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。・年号がなかったので追加しました。
sen.e: It is said that when Empress Shotoku became ill in 770, she was the only person who was allowed to visit the emperor's bedroom, serving as a liaison with the emperor's retainers or subjects.

sen.j: この間、勅旨によって藤原永手と真備に軍事権が委ねられている。
sen.e: While Emperor Shotoku was ill, the military power was delegated to FUJIWARA no Nagate and Makibi by Imperial paper.
While Empress Shotoku was ill, the military power was delegated to FUJIWARA no Nagate and Makibi by Imperial paper.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。
sen.e: While Empress Shotoku was ill, the military power was delegated to FUJIWARA no Nagate and Makibi by Imperial paper.

sen.j: 同年8月に称徳天皇が没すると、真備は後継者として文室浄三を、次いでその弟の文室大市を推したが失敗し、失脚した。
sen.e: When Emperor Shotoku passed away in August in the same year, Makibi backed up FUNYA no Kiyomi, and successively backed up his younger brother, FUNYA no Ochi as a successor, but she failed and fell from power.

When Empress Shotoku passed away in August in the same year, Makibi backed up FUNYA no Kiyomi, and successively backed up his younger brother, FUNYA no Ochi as a successor, but he failed and fell from power.
sen.cmt: ・称徳天皇は女性なのでEmpressとしました。・真備は男性なのでheに変更しました。
sen.e: When Empress Shotoku passed away in August in the same year, Makibi backed up FUNYA no Kiyomi, and successively backed up his younger brother, FUNYA no Ochi as a successor, but he failed and fell from power.

sen.j: しかし由利はその後も尚蔵に昇進しているため、真備を裏切った可能性も考えられる。
sen.e: Given that Yuri was promoted to Kuranokami (director of Zoshi) even after that, she might have betrayed Makibi.
